wikipedia_page.main: Francis George Parks (March 1875 – 14 May 1945) was a British amateur heavyweight boxer. He joined the Polytechnic Boxing Club in 1892, and won the Studd Trophy in 1902. He also won a bronze medal at the 1908 Summer Olympics.

response: *Frederick Parks (Frank's brother) won the bronze medal in Boxing at the 1908 Summer Olympics.
